Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay lets take a look at this event log The main goal is to identify any activities that occur more than once within the same case and then rename them based on their context First Ill scan through each case C001 C002 C003 to see if there are duplicate activity names

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C001 Verify Documents appears twice The first time its when the BackOfficeAgent checks initial documents and then again after the customer submits additional ones

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For C002 Theres also two instances of Call Customer The first one is about clarifying an account discrepancy while the second is a follow-up after adjustments were made

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: C003 has another pair of Verify Documents once for initial physical verification and then again post-adjustment

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So I need to rename these activities For Verify Documents maybe adding something like Initial or Re-verify For Call Customer perhaps differentiating between an outbound call and a follow-up call

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me check the Additional Context column for more clues The first Verify in C001 says checks identity documents while the second mentions re-checks documents now that ID scan is provided So maybe renaming them as Verify Documents Initial vs Re-verify Documents

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Similarly for C002s calls the first has a reason about an account discrepancy and the follow-up confirms adjustments Maybe name them accordingly

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Ill proceed to rename each instance and update the event log with these new names
